document_data.name: Aztil
document_data.mainbody: '''Aztil''' was one of the [[Eagle Knights (Maztica)|Eagle Knights]] of [[Nexal]].
document_data.History: In [[1361 DR]], Aztil was a fellow of [[Poshtli|Poshti]], a Eagle Knight and nephew of [[Naltecona]], and tried to convince him to abandon his fellows [[Halloran]] and [[Erixitl]] to their destinies.
